## Open source teaching materials

I strive to create high-quality open-source materials for my courses.
Texts are usually available under a [CC BY-SA 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) license, so you may share and adapt them provided you provide credit and also license your derivative work under the same terms. 

For questions about these materials, please raise an Issue on the relevant GitHub repository (preferred) or contact me by email.
